Package com.shashi.service.impl

Class ProductServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.shashi.service.impl.ProductServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductService
public class ProductServiceImpl extends Object implements ProductService
Implementation of the ProductService interface. This class handles all business logic related to products.

  • Method Details

    • addProduct

      public String addProduct(String prodName, String prodType, String prodInfo, double prodPrice, int prodQuantity, InputStream prodImage)
      Adds a new product to the database. This is a convenience method that constructs a ProductBean before calling the primary addProduct method.
      Specified by:
      addProduct in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      prodName - Name of the product.
      prodType - Type or category of the product.
      prodInfo - Information or description of the product.
      prodPrice - Price of the product.
      prodQuantity - Initial quantity of the product.
      prodImage - InputStream of the product's image.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the operation.

    • addProduct

      public String addProduct(ProductBean product)
      Adds a new product to the database using a ProductBean.
      Specified by:
      addProduct in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      product - The ProductBean object containing all product details.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the operation.

    • removeProduct

      public String removeProduct(String prodId)
      Removes a product from the database and any associated user carts.
      Specified by:
      removeProduct in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      prodId - The ID of the product to remove.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the removal.

    • updateProduct

      public String updateProduct(ProductBean prevProduct, ProductBean updatedProduct)
      Updates an existing product's details, including the image.
      Specified by:
      updateProduct in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      prevProduct - The product bean with the original product ID.
      updatedProduct - The product bean with the new details.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the update.

    • updateProductWithoutImage

      public String updateProductWithoutImage(String prevProductId, ProductBean updatedProduct)
      Updates a product's details without changing the image. This method has complex dependencies and is currently untestable without refactoring.
      Specified by:
      updateProductWithoutImage in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      prevProductId - The original product ID.
      updatedProduct - A ProductBean with the updated information.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the update.

    • sellNProduct

      public boolean sellNProduct(String prodId, int n)
      Decrements the quantity of a product after a sale.
      Specified by:
      sellNProduct in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      prodId - The ID of the product sold.
      n - The number of items sold.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.
